title: Can you flush 'flushable wet wipes' down the toilet after they have dried out? I know that flushable wipes can affect sewage drains, despite being branded as flushable, and that regular toilet paper breaks down easily when dunked in liquid. - Quora

response.answer_text: If wipes are used for toilet body waste then flush is the solution. When they are used to clean hands or face I use trash bag or dumpster/ basket. Sanitary drains are not intended for paper goods. Davis Caplan
